dcterms:creator: Y. Goyal
T. Khot
D. Summers-Stay
D. Batra
D. Parikh
dcterms:description: A commonly-used benchmark dataset for open-ended visual question answering (VQA) containing human annotated question-answer pairs for MS-COCO images.
dcterms:title: VQA-v2

dcterms:creator: J. Johnson
B. Hariharan
L. van der Maaten
L. Fei-Fei
C. Lawrence Zitnick
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: A synthesized dataset containing 100k images and 853k questions designed to test various aspects of visual reasoning including attribute identification, object counting, and logical operations.
dcterms:title: CLEVR

dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T. Berg
dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating visual grounding performance, collected from MS-COCO images, containing short queries to refer to objects in photographs of natural scenes.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T. Berg
dcterms:description: An extension of RefCOCO, this dataset contains short queries without any location words to refer to objects in photographs of natural scenes.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: J. Mao
J. Huang
A. Toshev
O. Camburu
A. L. Yuille
K. Murphy
dcterms:description: A dataset for visual grounding that includes longer queries to refer to objects in photographs of natural scenes, providing a more complex challenge for models.
dcterms:title: RefCOCOg
